subject: Lock render thread when surface is lost, wait for new surface.
commitMessage:
Lock render thread when surface is lost, wait for new surface.

If PreRender returns false, e.g. when there is no surface (for whatever
reason), then lock the render thread to prevent any GL calls from
occurring. Wait for a NewSurface request from event thread.

Change-Id: Ib64efbc1dfb3c8c5beab84ea76b6be97bfd9dcab
Signed-off-by: David Steele <david.steele@partner.samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 2: Code-Review-1

(6 comments)

Nitpick: This code does not obey our coding conventions at all:
* Spacing around branches and functions is out everywhere.
* At least on branch without curly braces.

Overall:
What is the point of this patch? There is no "why" in the description. Is it an optimization? If so, justify that with performance numbers. If it is leading to some design change, write about that in the commit message or share some design documents before pushing patches.

I have an idea for a large change to all resource loading that is based on mmap(). In that spirit, changing codecs to use memory APIs is great for me. But that design has not been discussed, let alone approved or started, and it is potentially less portable than basing resource loading on a file/stream abstraction.

If the bugs and coding violations are fixed I am happy for this change to go in.

subject: Tests for Image Loading Scaling Modes
commitMessage:
Tests for Image Loading Scaling Modes

[problem]
We have multiple modes for scaling images at load time
but no tests that systematically use those modes.

[solution]
Set of tests which load images of various aspect ratios and file types
using all of our ImageAttributes::ScalingModesSet of tests which load
images of various aspect ratios and file types using all of our
ImageAttributes::ScalingModes.

Change-Id: I3fe5ea1b1cc608f7971f527a4f46e268cb0fc3a9
Signed-off-by: Andrew Cox <andrew.cox@partner.samsung.com>

subject: Prevented crash when loaded image doesn't exist
commitMessage:
Prevented crash when loaded image doesn't exist

[Problem] Using the new BitmapLoader class with a non-existant file crashes
[Cause]   mBitmap pointer is not set on error, so dereferencing it causes crash
[Solution] Return empty values when accessing API's and bitmap pointer is not set.

Change-Id: Ibf328752cbf27062a7a2b60ec9af00802fd3b1aa
Signed-off-by: David Steele <david.steele@partner.samsung.com>

subject: Add handling for zero dimensions in ImageAttributes
commitMessage:
Add handling for zero dimensions in ImageAttributes

[problem]
Dali documents special handling of a zero width or zero height in
an ImageAttributes instance used in image loading,
but did not previously implement that behaviour.

[solution]
Handle desired image dimensions properly in image loading
thread.

Change-Id: I0d4d1f7d482dcceadaaf23977c1a892f0ad6948c
Signed-off-by: Andrew Cox <andrew.cox@partner.samsung.com>
